property.name: rrd.concurrency
property.description: Concurrency threads for updating rrd file

property.name: rrd.update.period
property.description: The interval that RrdService update rrd file, in second

property.name: rrd.stop.timeout
property.description: The timeout for stop RrdService, in second

property.name: rrd.home
property.description: The timeout for stop RrdService, in second, default is /u01/app/oracle/tools/oehp/rrd
